# deps/chromium/base/process

set(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR "${CHROMIUM_BASE_DIR}/process")

file(GLOB CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_HEADERS "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*.cc")

# Remove sources for other platform or unit test:
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_unittest.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_aix.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_mac.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_win.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_freebsd.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_openbsd.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_ios.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_DIR}/*_fuchsia.cc")

list(APPEND CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS ${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_HEADERS})
list(APPEND CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES ${CHROMIUM_BASE_PROCESS_SOURCES})

set(CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS ${CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES ${CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
